title: Extensible Concurrency with Send and Sync
description: In this lab, we explore the two concurrency concepts in Rust - the Send and Sync traits, which provide extensible concurrency capabilities beyond the standard library.

meta.title: Extensible Concurrency with the Send and Sync Traits | Rust Concurrency
meta.description: Explore the Send and Sync traits in Rust, which provide extensible concurrency capabilities beyond the standard library.
meta.keywords: Rust, Concurrency, Send, Sync, Traits, Extensible Concurrency
